Articles.Content:
I plant a few sticks of dynamite at the walls, blowing the dam open. You are washed away in the current produced.

My soggy hill.

I

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/z0_nuvPKIi8?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 way to off you.
My hill.

I tunnel under your hill, place a bomb containing 46.5 miligrams of antimatter. Boom.

My crater, in which I shall build an underground bunker.

If anyone's curious, I calculated it a while back, that amount of antimatter produces a 2 kiloton blast.

GODUS.

I pull various rock strata out from the sides of the crater, closing it up and crushing you. I then destroy a load of rocks, so where the hill once stood there is now a circular area clear of stones.

My circle of clear-ness.

I drop a hill on your circle of clear-ness.

My hill.

I kick you out the window.

My hill.

I kick you out of the window.

My hill.

I do it again.

My hill.

I destroy such window, and put my own impenetrable fortress on top of the hill, kicking you out in the process.

My hill.

I fire you. out of a canon. into the sun.

my hill

I put you out, and throw you in a deep fat frier.

Mein hÃƒÂ¼gel.

While you are looking at the edge of the frier how FlamingPotatos is becoming chips, I push you over the edge.

My hill

The king has returned!

And effective immediately the kill is to be grassy with small shrubs and natural vegetation, pockmarked by the craters of centuries of warfare yet free from the taint of nuclear devices or poisonous gases. 

I will be enforcing this by bullets, to defend my flag atop the hill.

I ram you with the SUAV. I flood the area with nuclear devices (stored underground) and cover the hill with poisonous gases, which I make a big tank of below too. I then build impenetrable defenses.

My hill.

I use this ship:

![krenim-weaponship.jpg](http://www.ex-astris-scientia.org/schematics/krenim-weaponship.jpg)

and wipe out your existance, reverting the hill to a green and grassy state, which I promptly claim.

My hill.

A hotlink-alert-picture?

I use fire to destroy your ship and you. I claim this green and grassy hill!

![29diu00.jpg](http://i43.tinypic.com/29diu00.jpg)

Boom go your head.

My hill.

I ask Jebediah to pilot your hill.

My crash site.

I call in Aperture Science's nanobot repair crew to repair the hill. You get repaired into it.

My hill.

(Try to keep it intact plz)

Can we live in peace? I build a hill next to XMark's.

My extra hill.

I suck your hill up with human sized black holes and then put them around and in the air above so anyone who trys to take my hill gets sucked up

My blackhole guarded hill

I dump dirt and stuff on top of the crater, burying you with it.

My hill!

I sent 99942 Apophis to destroy the hill.

The split second before the destruction, though, the Time Machine reverts everything to pre-war stage, knowing that I might destroy the hill and end the thread instead.

So... no one's hill.

Time stops.

By the incredible moderation powers entrusted to me, time is undone and the hill is restored to how it was in the first post of this thread- a lovely grassy hilltop with a flagpole on the peak, some craters from centuries of bloodshed, and a few shrubs to cover an advancing army. 

My time-warped hill.

[in alternate dimension, with hill before it was reverted]

"Well, seeing as no one is here, I think I'll just walk over here and..."

My hill
